00033 
00034 #include <avr/io.h>
00035 #include <avr/interrupt.h> 
00036 #include "accel_capture.h"
00037 #include "globals.h"
00038 
00039 
00040 SIGNAL(  SIG_INPUT_CAPTURE3 )
00041 {
00042                 
00043                 if( TCCR3B &( 1<<ICES3) ) /* if edge was rising */
00044                 {
00045                         /* save the captured value */
00046                         accl_low_samples[ accl_low_idx++ ]  = ICR3;
00047                         accl_low_idx &= (ACCL_SAMPLES_BUFSIZE-1);
00048                         TCNT3 = 0x00; /* reset counter to start from 0 */
00049                         TCCR3B &= ~( 1<<ICES3 ); /* trigger to falling edge */
00050                 }
00051                 else /* edge was falling */
00052                 {
00053                         /* save the captured value */
00054                         accl_high_samples[ accl_high_idx++ ]  = ICR3;
00055                         accl_high_idx &= (ACCL_SAMPLES_BUFSIZE-1);
00056                         /* cut index value to array-size */
00057                         TCNT3 = 0x00; /* reset counter to start from 0 */
00058                         TCCR3B |= ( 1<<ICES3 ); /* trigger to rising edge */
00059                 }
00060 }
00061 
00062 
00063 void init_accel_capture( )
00064 {       
00065         /** Set Timer3's Control Register A */
00066         /** 7,6: COM3A1, COM3A0 = 00 -> Normal port operation of OC3A 
00067          *  5,4: COM3B1, COM3B1 = 00 -> Normal port operation of OC3B   
00068          *  3,2: COM3C1, COM3C1 = 00 -> Normal port operation of OC3C
00069          *  1,0: WGM31, WGM30 = 00 -> Normal mode of operation for counter, 
00070          *                                                              no waveform generation
00071          */
00072         TCCR3A = 0x00;
00073         
00074         /** Set Timer3's Control Register B */
00075         /** 7: ICNC3 = 0 -> no noise cancellation
00076          *  6: ICES3 = 1 -> trigger on rising edge of ICP3
00077          *  4,3: WGM33, WGM32 = 00 -> no waveform generation
00078          *  2,1,0: CS32, CS31,CS30 = 0,0,1 -> no prescaling, timer runs with full CPU speed
00079          */
00080          TCCR3B = 0x00 | (1<<ICES3) | (1<<CS30) ;
00081          
00082          /** Set Timer extended IRQ Mask Register */
00083          /** 7,6 Reserved = 0 
00084           *  5: TICIE3 = 1 Enable Timer 3 capture interrupt
00085           *  4: OCIE3A = 0 disable CompareMatch Interrupt A
00086           *  3: OCIE3B = 0 disable CompareMatch Interrupt B
00087           *  2: TOIE3 = 0 disable Timer3 overflow interrupt
00088           *  1: OCIE3C = 0 diable CompareMatch Interrupt C
00089           *  0: OCIE1C = dont change - belong to timer 1!
00090           */
00091           /* clear everything but the first bit (as it is for Timer 1) */
00092          ETIMSK = ETIMSK & ( 1); 
00093          ETIMSK = ETIMSK | (1<<TICIE3);
00094          
00095          /* clear index to accel-samples ringbuffer */
00096          accl_low_idx = 0;
00097          accl_high_idx = 0;
00098          
00099          /* ICP3 to be an input */
00100          DDRE = DDRE &~ (PE7);
00101 }
